channel.title: New BURZUM Album
channel.description:
Burzum is releasing a new album in 1 week. There's a preview on Youtube already
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bws72xEoMlw&feature=channel[/url] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ey2DSDwDIY4&feature=related[/url]
For those of you who aren't aware of Burzum, he's one of the original "Black Metal" artists from Norway. He just got out of prison recently after serving a 14 year sentence for murder and (I think) burning churches.
I haven't listened to that style of music for some time, but his new stuff is surprisingly listenable and strangely relaxing. Anyway, "Black Mesa" reminds me of "Black Metal" so here you go, enjoy.

item.title: New BURZUM Album
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
I like this “one man band” thing Burzum has.

Imagine some black metal fag sitting there with white facepaint, black eye shadow, long greasy black hair, banging the shit out of the cymbals between his knees, double-bassing the bass drum, shredding the guitar and rocking the harmonica.

Read full topic

item.title: New BURZUM Album
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Burzum is releasing a new album in 1 week. There’s a preview on Youtube
already

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bws72xEoMlw&feature=channel
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ey2DSDwDIY4&feature=related

For those of you who aren’t aware of Burzum, he’s one of the original “Black Metal” artists from Norway. He just got out of prison recently after serving a 14 year sentence for murder and (I think) burning churches.

I haven’t listened to that style of music for some time, but his new stuff is surprisingly listenable and strangely relaxing. Anyway, “Black Mesa” reminds me of “Black Metal” so here you go, enjoy.
